title: Il覺ca (Ayas: cemetery)
description: Cemetery site northwest of Ankara containing burials dated to the Hittite period (16th century BCE). The modern neighborhood of Il覺ca is in the Ayas district of Turkey's Ankara province.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the modern village from which the Il覺ca site (located about 200m to the south) is named, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node.
